description: By far the bestpresentation I've ever sen for an RSS reader.
Loving it. Reader mode, website mode, customer feeds and folders. Custom notification rules is very good.
summary: Full featured and better than anything i've found so far

description: The clean UI and the ease of use is amazing!

- That Windows style window decorations is a turn off for me. 
- It is an electron app so use it with caution.
- Why does it need access to home folder?

Works great. Compared to a few other native apps it has a better performance and looks / content management. However, the top bar and the UI looks very windows like which is not my favorite. If you can live with that, the app works pretty well.
summary: Great app but the UI is not adapting to the theme

description:
Difficult to add feeds in batches.
Difficult to manage and re-organize feeds.
When I opened it up it did not have the same look and feel as my GTK theme.
summary: Says it supports dark mode but..

description: With a plesent UI design and a lot of feature it's just perfect. But only one complaint is that could have made more seemless with gnome. It doesnot respect gnome theme at all.

On Fedora 36 (both Gnome and KDE Plasma) the images that should display along with the title of articles do not show up. I don't know if this is can be changed somewhere in settings. I have not had any luck with finding it. Otherwise it is a really good RSS feed application making it easy to see and select the different articles without being overwhelmed.

Right off the bat the interface looks out of place in Ubuntu 22.04.
In the screenshots found on the dev's page on Github, it looks very much like Inoreader's interface, which isn't necessarily a bad thing.
summary: What an eyesore in gnome environment!

description: Amazing card view! It is really wonderful! Love it so much! Has nextcloud RSS syncronization - what is really appreciated of me.

The experiance was fine and smooth up until fedora 38. Last week , udated my system to fedora 39 and got this app installed. When i launch this app . the app display no window. But system moniter shows the app run in background.

Tiene buena pinta el programa, pero no puedo ampliar la fuente. Tengo un portátil de 14", y la letra normalmente la tengo ampliada en mi escritorio Gnome. No se amplía de manera automática con el entorno, pero tampoco deja ampliarla. Debería poder la opción de ampliar la fuente de la interfaz y las noticias. De momento la desinstalo.

La aplicación es fácil de usar y cuenta con una interfaz limpia y minimalista. Permite importar fuentes de noticias desde un archivo OPML o agregar nuevas fuentes manualmente. Además, se personalizar la frecuencia de actualización de las fuentes y elegir entre diferentes vistas para leer los artículos.
opcion de zoon , esta opcion de rss local tambien deben estar en ios apple
Спасибо большое разработчику за качественный инструмент для обзора новостей по rss-лентам
